## Description
A popular snake bar made from puffed quinoa/rice/wheat, honey/sugarcane juice, dried fruits and peanuts

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|true|
|Type:|Derived|
|Form:|Solid|
